title: Fullstack Web Developer
subtitle: TrustClaim & LinkedClaims Projects
description: Spearheaded backend development for TrustClaim Website, leveraging Node.js and Prisma to enhance functionality and user experience.
Collaborated in UI/UX design, implementing user interfaces with ReactJs and Material-UI for intuitive navigation and aesthetic appeal.
Played a key role in the LinkedClaims Project, advancing web3 technologies using Solid Server and Google SDK to forge secure, decentralized applications.
Ensured robust application performance and security, contributing to the project's success in the evolving landscape of web3 solutions.

title: Fullstack Developer
subtitle: Modareseen.com
description: As a Fullstack Developer at Modareseen.com, I played a pivotal role in developing and maintaining our web applications.
I created engaging and responsive frontend interfaces using Next.js and Material-UI, collaborating closely with the design team.
On the backend, I designed robust APIs with Firebase, optimized performance, and ensured security and scalability.
Working in a team of three, I also managed the payment section, integrating the Fawaterak API for secure transactions.
This experience enriched my technical skills, teamwork, and integration expertise, contributing to the success of our platform.

title: Frontend Developer Intern
subtitle: Majdy Yaaqoub Center
description: As a Frontend Developer Intern at the Majdy Yaaqoub Center, I contributed to a vital humanitarian cause by enhancing their online presence.
I crafted captivating user interfaces, collaborating with the center's team to translate their vision into interactive web experiences.
I honed my skills in GitHub, actively contributing to collaborative coding efforts, and gained proficiency in Next.js, a powerful framework for modern web applications.
This rewarding internship reinforced the impact of technology in making a difference, deepening my passion for creating meaningful digital solutions.
